perc_w_int_100_20_using_devices.long_name: Percent of the Internet-Connected Population with Fast Internet Speed
perc_w_int_100_20_using_devices.short_description: ercent of the internet-connected population with a fast internet speed (above 100 Mbps Download and 20 Mbps Upload, able to stream HD video on multiple devices or download large files quickly)
